website_summaries.verdict: The Sony NSZ-GT1 combines Google TV and Blu-ray in a single box, but Sony's frustrating controller, the high price, and Google TV's content issues make it a tough sell.
pros: Blu-ray player with built-in Google TV
revolutionary Google TV software enables potential access to virtually all online media, with a powerful interface
user interface overlays TV content from cable/satellite box
can control TV, AV receiver, and cable/satellite box with IR blasters
Google search bar looks through both online and offline content
built-in Chrome browser supports Flash and HTML5 video
cons: Frustrating controller handles neither Google TV or Blu-ray well
major content providers like Hulu, CBS, and ABC are currently blocking Google TV
user interface geared toward power users
expensive compared with other Wi-Fi Blu-ray players
doesn't work with older, non-HD TVs

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Show good picture, but unit is too old to update, apps don't work
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The Honeycomb update that was just released provides a much needed User Interface revamp and I couldn't be happier with it. It's incredibly simple to setup and really neat to be able to search the internet while I'm watching TV. The only cons are: - No 3D Blu Ray support - Some blocked online content, like Hulu, but I mostly use it for Netflix - Remote is kind of clunky, but I just use the free iPhone app instead, which is great (there's an Android App too) Those three cons aren't really important to me, which is why I still gave it 5 stars. But if you're looking for any of those features, you should probably look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Chemistruck

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I just recvd this Sony GT1 Google TV this morning, and had it up and running in an hour. I haven't tried all the bells and whistles, but the Chrome browser works great for your average website, and being an Amazon Prime member I was easily able to stream free videos from my account. I've seen others mention the small size of the "remote" keyboard... but to me there wasn't an issue. It's like texting on an android phone with a pop out keyboard. Use your thumbs! I was also able to get it to load in my DirecTv information... which is nice because the only satelitte service mentioned in the ad is Dish network. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: paul mcb

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Having issues getting my chrome synced with Google TV. Also seems that the major networks and HULU are blocking GoogleTV. There are some work arounds, Then some of the software is not compatible with the SONY platform. A little harder to operate out of the box than I thought it would be. Mostly because the 3rd party vendor verified that the product worked before shipping. So I had to do a factory reset to get going. The vendor did state up front that they do open the product to check the hardware to make sure it works. I contacted SONY via email for initial issues getting started and they were prompt and helpful
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Our son ordered this player for us, and was in charge of setting it up. The player arrived by Fed Ex, and in the time we expected. We had only one little glitch (the remote didn't function), but once we contacted the seller, they quickly responded and sent us out a new remote right away. It worked! Erik was very courteous and prompt in responding to our emails, and did not require us to return the defective remote. He had also offered a full refund or a total replacement of the entire package if that was what we wanted. Excellent customer service, and we will definitely shop here again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bence

customer_reviews.title: Great attempt.
customer_reviews.text: I like this version of Google TV much better than the logitech. It still needs some work though. The touch pad mouse is not good at all. The browser crashes when trying to use the HBOgo and other other streaming. The Netflix streaming works well though. I love the ability to instantly search and to play youtube videos. It is also nice to be able to type in the name of a show and it lets me know quickly if its on and on which channel.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred J Speller

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever live without this?!?!?!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not give this five stars is because you cannot use Hulu on it and you have to use the web browser for Amazon Prime videos instead of an app like Netflix. If they fixed those two issues then this would be the most perfect tv equipment available on earth! As it stands, I really hope they get things worked out with Hulu and PLEASE develop an app for Amazon Prime!!! Wifi is quick and simple setup. Have had this for 3 months and so far so good! QWERTY keyboard remote control...enough said!!!! Oh, and you can play BluRay DVDs too...
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Maggio

customer_reviews.title: Use Everyday!
customer_reviews.text: What a great investment. My friends and visitors to my home think this box is so cool. Being able to go online, watch Youtube, play Pandora, surf the net, and download android marketplace apps. I love beaming movies from my computer and phone to this box for fun-filled family entertainment. My kids watch Netflix on it all day, and absolutely love it. Great investment. When this one breaks, I will surely buy the exact same brand. My only gripe is that some websites won't work because of the flash conflict and you can't watch HULU PLus.
customer_reviews.author: LionelB

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, it does exactly what the manufactures claim. The start up was straight forward. the first thing you need to do is update the firmware, set a few settings and it is working. I feel it is worth every penny. It is a really good blue ray player with the bonus of surfing the web, plus the android apps. If I had another T.V. I would get another one. very recommended. also the remote is greatest thing ever, if you have had any experience with the PS3 you already know the remote, for the most part. I love it. it is fun.
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Use this to run PLEX only google TV that supports DTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an extensive movie library and I use PLEX media server to stream all my movies throughout my house. In my struggles to find a Google TV box that could play my MKV's from my PLEX server natively with DTS audio I stumbled on this. This is the only Google TV box that supports DTS audio natively requiring no transcoding. This handles my large file MKVs with DTS audio with ZERO problems and no stutter. This machine is older but is perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Marchione

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but software doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to reduce the number of electronic devices for my entertainment system and so I tried this. Most things seemed to work ok except when trying to update the software. For some reason this has a terrible time trying to access the app store and install updates. I called Sony and gave them the error codes I kept seeing and they said it was a bad device. Well.... I suppose that could be, but I returned it for a refund and assumed that this needs more work before I purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony Internet Device/Blu-Ray player
customer_reviews.text: Love this Internet Device/Blu-ray player. Just bought my third. It has full Internet connection, not the limited use apps that you get on about everything else. I hate apps. It has a full, not terribly small, keyboard and a bunch of shortcuts. Remote is ergonomic. It has the ability to switch between watching a disc and going on Internet. Other require disc be removed to use Internet functions. It seems Sony has discontinued this item. Hating that.
customer_reviews.author: Mac McIlmoil

customer_reviews.title: Internet on your TV
customer_reviews.text: Not just a blu-ray player. If you don't have a smart TV, this dvd player when connected to your wi-fi can also connect to the internet. I was able to check my email and accounts right from my TV. Although it did break and I wanted to replace it with another, but the price is still up there. One would think with such old technology, the price would've came down by now, since it hase been 2 years. I just bought a different blu ray with wi-fi for far less.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: The Google TV platform is no longer supported!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my player less than two months ago. It is no longer supported and is unable to get updates now. The disc player is just fine, but you will not be able to use the Google TV platform anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed with the new Google TV
customer_reviews.text: I am looking to get rid of cable this year and I am feeling optimistic that this product will help me do just that. The box was easy to setup and use as a Blu-Ray player and also for streaming Netflix. With that said, this Sony box has the following limitations in my opinion: - Does not control volume of attached devices using CEC. You have to use IR blasters. - The lack of a built-in TV tuner is a glaring oversight. I am planning on setting up a separate HDMI TV tuner that will do this.
customer_reviews.author: Bertram Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good with limitations
customer_reviews.text: It is good with limitations. I don't feel like paying fees for other useless icons. I only had Netflix subscription and other free internet sites for movies and entertainment. This device is very strict to which website you are accessing, it will work if the website compatible with Sony authorized media players
customer_reviews.author: AceNYC

customer_reviews.title: Fraud
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective when I received it. It’s missing many features and has issues connecting to networks. When I contacted the seller, he had no interest in helping me.
customer_reviews.author: DWilliams

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorite toys in my living room.
customer_reviews.text: everybody uses in my house, this is money well worth it. stead of buying smart tvs and get stuck with a tv remote control to search the internet, it is frustrating!!! with this Sony blue ray you can used with any tv you got or move it from room to room or if you got a newer tv you do not have to pay $400 extra for a SMART TV.
customer_reviews.author: gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I saw this while browsing cyber Monday while looking for a gift for my girlfriend. I mainly use it as a Netflix device but the possibilities are much wider than something like Roku and for the sale price much more function can be gotten from it. I love the fact that I can use my Android phone as a remote with it. The only drawback I have is while the included remote is very good and easy to use it does not a backlight or even glowing keys for the basic buttons (play and pause).
customer_reviews.author: deez

customer_reviews.title: Very cool little box!
customer_reviews.text: Google tv is great, still up and coming so not a whole lot of channels yet. Bluray player works great, and google chrome to browse the web. What else do you need. Plus picture in picture for live tv and use a google phone as a remote via wifi. CPU seems a little slow at times, and remote reception is a litttle weak. but I hear a new version is to be released so hopefully google will step it up there
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied; however there is a little false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: one of the main reason i bought this specific google tv is because of its blu ray capabilities and of course having the internet on a tv feature. I am completely satisfied with these two areas. however on the commercials and even some retail boxes it advertises the ability to play Hulu, which is not possible at the moment until Google releases an update. This to me was one of the major disappointments for me, however i got what i needed and really wanted the internet browsing on a tv and a blu-ray player.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: HATE
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the remote control or a manual in the box with this order so this idea is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I was first interested in this because of the full qwerty keyboard. The interface is very intuitive and the apps are very easy to get through. There is also a new upgrade that makes the interface scroll through like flipping pages. With the youtube and netflix app, I sent my cable company packing. You won't be disappointed with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: 61keys

customer_reviews.title: A Good Machine
customer_reviews.text: Ok I know reading the reviews might make you not want to buy this machine well dont beleive them if you grew up with any form of technology set up is a breeze and they walk you threw step by step. The Picture quality is also great along with the features. The remote is also set up like a phone keyboard and is very easy to navigate especially if you read the directions. it doesn't have a lot of apps yet but i hear they are on the way but i am able to wirelessly access net flix:)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Don't Even Hack It
customer_reviews.text: It absolutely does not work as a streaming media device. Setup was impossible without visiting the GTVHacker site. Even then, you need four separate 4GB key drives formatted to FAT32 for all of the software to download and a lot of patience to get through the update sequence. Once rooted, you have an Android, but a lousy IP TV device. I can confirm that Google is actively blocking your logins, so Play Store won't work, and the Netflix API won't respond to the device ID to let you enter an activation code. Save yourself a weekend of frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Zahrobsky

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I have had the sony tv with Google built in and loved it so, I bought just the top unit for bedroom and with the new updates made it even more awesome I cant believe I could do with out it now watch football and check and post face book same time love it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a good while back (maybe as much as 5 years) and it still works great. I have seen just the remote for sale used on Amazon and they are asking up to 79,00. No Problems what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice for blue ray
customer_reviews.text: Web Browser is nice but the unit is not compatible with Hulu plus, nor can you watch shows posted on your favorite sites CBS, NBC etc. Netfix works and you can watch YouTube but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: corbin d ellsaesser

customer_reviews.title: Great Blu Ray Player!
customer_reviews.text: I do not use the Google TV capabilities often but the are there if I ever want to use them. I love how you can use the same remote with both the Google TV and your Television. I also like how with a simple firmware update I can now play 3D Blu Rays. This is great for anyone who wants a simple Blu Ray Player with a ton of Smart features.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Z

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: This Sony/Google TV setup is great. Setup is a snap, the initial update takes awhile but well worth the wait. Depending on your internet connection speed, Netflix, YouTube, Google browser are all avaliable. 3D Blu-ray player, check & create your e-mail on your big screen, connect your satelite or cable box (HDMI only), set it up and control it with the qwerty keyboard. I love it! I see Sony has discontinued this model...what a shame:(
customer_reviews.author: Target

customer_reviews.title: Great player...complicated remote
customer_reviews.text: This is a great player, but I for one felt very overwhelmed by the remote control, and I returned the player after a week of use. If you're electronic savvy, this is your machine. If not, and you want simplicity in your remote, I would suggest you move on.
customer_reviews.author: jhnesunshine

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I love surfing the internet that it displays on my tv and i like the fact that the remote also controls my tv, cable box and sound system. It needs more apps but withe the internet at your finger tips it makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Love the Google TV
customer_reviews.text: Love the Google TV for streaming video online. One complaint is that they have blocked access to free Hulu.com in an attempt to force you to subscribe to Hulu Plus. Biggest complaint is that I never received a receipt for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Boekhaus

customer_reviews.title: wifi dvd
customer_reviews.text: System worked as advertised and included HDMI cable for connection to TV. However initial wireless setup did not work correctly and after many tries finally was able to connect wireless to Linksys with encryption. Once configured the Unit required an update of the system firmware and then required a repeat of the Wireless install setup which options were re-labeled and worked correctly the second time through. The Sony Play station like controls are great including the thumb scroll and QWERTY keyboard is excellent. This is so much better and beats the leader (TIVO) the price point is half cost of TIVO and about two and half times more than new Apple TV (720P) which is elementary.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Pillows

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i love this sony google tv blu ray player... it brings the internet to the tv...there's nothing you cant do on it... i use it to watch amazon prime videos on the tv as well as check email etc...plenty of apps too
customer_reviews.author: daviggi

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: This products does exactly what it states it will do. Set up was very simple and fast. I really enjoy the quick access to the internet to review something or get caught on a subject. I can access everything email, Google IM, Facebook and virtually any other web page. The down side is that Hulu blocks anyone gaining access from Google TV and the remote does not match all the same keys for the Time Warner DVR. I am not able to complete a few DVR transactions like delete a recording without using the original remote.
customer_reviews.author: techie

customer_reviews.title: sony bluray/google tv
customer_reviews.text: I installed it myself following sonys easy step by step instructions.And now i cant believe how i can watch TV and surf the internet at the same time! or switch to the bluray player to watch a DVD movie.My Family loves it. I got it for a good price. I am very happy with it, My oldest Daughter is buying one for her and her husband. It comes with a built in program that teaches you how to use all the buttons on the controller and all the features that it has.The internet sure looks better on my HD TV than on my computer! It has a full web browser so the web pages load up pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Juan5228

customer_reviews.title: Liked the remote but device had issues
customer_reviews.text: I liked the setup of the system and the remote with a full keyboard, but there was an audio issue playing Netflix or DVDs where it would go in and out through playing the video. Also do not like how it does not have Hulu.
customer_reviews.author: FlowC

customer_reviews.title: So so with potential
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Sony Blue Ray player with Google TV. So far I 45% like it. My biggest complaint is the lite version of the Android Market that is available. Not many apps at all! Not even compatible with Google Videos. If I want to rent a movie I have to go through Amazon. That is one of the features I just assumed would be there. Hopefully an update will eventually make this product more useful. Until then, 2 stars...
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is advertised to do
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product and I like it except that the remote mouse device does not work well. Although you can work the web with this thing, it is difficult. Part of that is due to the software and part due to the mouse device.
customer_reviews.author: D. Linhardt

customer_reviews.title: Love it for the purpose i bought
customer_reviews.text: initially i was hesitant to buy this after seeing bad reviews but still went for it because of bluray player and amazon return policy. Its really good. remote is compact and easy to use except for the buttons being hard. bluray player plays normal dvd's too and the quality is amazing. i use it for basic browsing and dvd and i'm happy with it. one of my friends bought logitech revue and he liked the remote of sony and the additional dvd player.
customer_reviews.author: Ven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Surf the web, watch netflix and get pretty much every android app on your hdtv. Did I mention the amazing blu-ray player? All the ingredients for an awesome entertainment experience at home!
customer_reviews.author: Customer8501

customer_reviews.title: total piece of crap - do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: Had one hell of a time getting this set up and I am reasonably tech-savvy. It constantly looses internet connection and reboots itself randomly. There has got to be something better out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ironically wont play Amazon Prime Movies in HD
customer_reviews.text: Ironically wont play Prime Movies in HD,, what were these guys thinking? It needed a real Amazon Movie app rather then just the web page... Best internet access I have seen on these devices..
customer_reviews.author: Don G

customer_reviews.title: It just works, love it!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! Looks good, works wonderfully well and I don't get the people that complain about the remote. It is really very well thought out and does its job. And a good job at that.
customer_reviews.author: farcha

customer_reviews.title: Love the remote!
customer_reviews.text: The full-key remote made it easy to browse the internet. Make sure you have decent high-speed internet connection and a good network router. I have to upgrade mine to COX preferred in order to play YouTube HD videos smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Google TV
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a remarkable product. However, I found it difficult and slow to operate. The key pad was too small for my big hands.
customer_reviews.author: rebader

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: It’s not connecting to WIFi I am not able to use it
customer_reviews.author: kanwar

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works GREAT! We have eliminated 4 remote controls and now use this awesome little keyboard to do whatever we want! Internet, Netflix, DVD, it's awesome! That being said, we received a USED box from Modia, the seller. It was already registered and had items bookmarked and so forth. Luckily, it was easy to unregister, then re-register under our name. About two weeks after I contacted Modia about this, they are now going to credit my account for a partial, reasonable amount since the box was used. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: MetalMama

customer_reviews.title: Something that works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I went through the reviews as many do before I made this purchase. I realized there was a risk in anything I buy online. I would consider myself reasonably knowledgeable in electronic technology and this was a simple "plug and play" process! I know others have written with issues, I have had none of them happen to me...yet! I would highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Rutkowski

customer_reviews.title: The Sony Nsz-GT1 best player as GoogleTV
customer_reviews.text: Works great I love it. The sony blue rays works great as Google TV and plays excellent Blue Ray movies
customer_reviews.author: A. Waweru

customer_reviews.title: still love it.......
customer_reviews.text: Six months and we still love it....... Sony has the best google tv. Plus the bluray player is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS FREAKING THING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite purchase this year. Easy to set up, easy to work. Does exactly what I wanted and expected with zero hassle. The fireplace app is my go-to for relaxing and with NetFlix at the touch of a button, my kids are always entertained. I plan on getting one for every room of the house. This goes into the catagory of "how did I ever live without it?"
customer_reviews.author: bryan raymond

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to order this Blu-ray player because the description seemed to imply that the ony DVRs that are fully supported are those from Dish Network. But, I went ahead and bought it even though I have DirectTv. I figured I could also hook up the DVR directly if the Sony didn't work smoothly with it. I am happy to report that my DirectTv DVR coexists perfectly with the Sony box. I am able to operate all the controls - including accessing the playlist - with the Sony remote. I am very glad I didn't let the negative reviews keep me from buying this amazing device.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It was a piece of cake to setup and it just works. I can control and operate everything, TV, DirecTV DVR, Netflix, web browser and the Bluray simply from one remote. Its like having one device that does it all
customer_reviews.author: MR56

customer_reviews.title: Blu-ray Media Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this Blu-ray player! I bought this for my father for Christmas to go with his new flat screen tv. The features are amazing! Since I already have amazon prime, the amount of media you can receive for free is amazing! He is in love!
customer_reviews.author: dmdgirl

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Device
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if I should buy this new technology, but I'm glad I did. I can now watch ESPN 3, YouTube, and surf the net through my TV.
customer_reviews.author: knaimi

customer_reviews.title: Really nice device.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really cool little device. Scan the internet, watch netflix, rent movies, etc. I really like the remote and that it's an all-in-one device. Don't really need anything else. For under $200 it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Palioc33

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I followed the direction and hooked it up. It now controls my TV, cable box, DVR, etc. I can also surf the web and rent movies on line as well as playing DVDs at home. The picture quality is great. I'm continuing to explore with it and finding other ways to use it! I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jeri

customer_reviews.title: Convert your ordinary hd tv to a smart tv
customer_reviews.text: Great product in general... Easy to use... Easy to set up... The mouse could be a little better... Would be great I'd added a webcam functionality
customer_reviews.author: nish

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this for $240 and am very pleased with the easy setup and also the many features that are available.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Bragiel

customer_reviews.title: Missing APP to se your personal Films in your Router
customer_reviews.text: Sony Should develop an APP to see (play) files in your WiFi - Attached HD, so you can see all your family films in this device, instead on a computer or some other device!! That's why I just give 4 stars instead 5
customer_reviews.author: Jose salcedo

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because we needed a blue ray player in another room and because i wanted to try google tv it fit the bill,it plays blue rays easy enough the web surfing is not bad i think this will be more complete when google releases the app store for it
customer_reviews.author: phoneman

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and worth it
customer_reviews.text: The setup is easy and definitely quality. Amazon has the best price for this item. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fontanaangel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful disc player with Google TV!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Sony NSZ-GT1 Wi-fi enabled Blue ray disc player with Google TV from Amazon. The shipping was fast, the box came before the anticipated time. The disc player works well, although we have not seen any blue ray discs yet. The Google TV part also works well. Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sumita

customer_reviews.title: new tech toy
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product it does have a few glitches , like hulu has some issues when wanting to load a movie.
customer_reviews.author: TRACEY

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: the first time i bought this product i fell in love with it. It is user friendly, stream movies, check emails and do so much more with this device. I will recommend this product to anyone to buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for christmas because he wanted a bluray player. Easy to install. Said it assimilated everything into the collective including the directv receiver.
customer_reviews.author: pmccarty

customer_reviews.title: A great blu ray player!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful blu ray player and the Google Tv features are fun too-- Google needed to address some functionality issues with this version (not sure what is out there now), but the keyboard/remote is bulky and a little slow and some of the "apps" on the software are clumsy BUT still very useful especially if you want your netflix without having a separate PC.
customer_reviews.author: Will White

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I order the Sony google tv four weeks ago. It is great we are able to search on google anything. We can download movies and rent. We can listing to pandora and look at tv at the same time. It turn our hd tv into a smart tv, instantly. It was the greatest gift foe my boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Techy

customer_reviews.title: i dont have to say too much words
customer_reviews.text: I dont have to say many words to explain, its the best buy that a make in 2 years , you never use the tv like you used before, this is another step in entertainment, the only bad is that i live in latin america and some opcion are not available, but you wont be disappointed!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: blaster

customer_reviews.title: Strange Reviews
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great unit. The remote takes some getting used to. I use my HTC EVO as a remote and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: John E. Grebe

customer_reviews.title: Both the seller and the item
customer_reviews.text: Seller - overpriced, unresponsive Item - Doesn't function. We've even paid to have a tech come out to try to re-install us, lest it is us. Not. The item doesn't work, doesn't turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product

customer_reviews.title: Sony NSZ-GT1 review
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase of the Sony NSZ-GT1 blu-ray player with Goggle TV. find the wireless conection with my computer to access my pictures and videos a pleasent supprise. The included apps and the ones I can download are very usefull.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I was able to purchase before all remaining ones were sold.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with my new Visio LED TV. Too bad it was dropped by Sony. Their loss. I'm happy.

customer_reviews.title: Neat Product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and it works very well, even works with my other brand remote controls. It has internet surfing as well at NetFlix etc.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use to access the Internet
customer_reviews.text: I find it easy to access the Internet, and email except that it needs more software to play videos or attachment in the email.
customer_reviews.author: Filly

customer_reviews.title: Sony vs. Logitech Google TV
customer_reviews.text: I compared the Sony and Logitech google TV offerings, and decided to keep the Sony for the reasons of: 1) Logitech already announced to discontinue the support and development of Revue. No further enhancement of OS for future google TV update. 2) on a side by side comparison, I noticed the Sony has a better picture (sharpness and color saturation) than Logitech 3) The revue full size remote is too big for day to day use. However, the Sony track ball is not sensitive at times.
customer_reviews.author: bkh

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: We are really happy with our new Sony Blu-ray with Google TV. It does everything we expected it to do and really like the internet feature to view programming online. It's easy to use and is perfect for what we need!
customer_reviews.author: jennyv

customer_reviews.title: The Sony internet tv
customer_reviews.text: It was been a life saver for me. I purchased the item for my wife for christmas and she loves it. She has taken over a room in the house with is solely for her and her sony tv. She raves about all that is does and the different apps. that are available for her use. But i tell her all the time that the same things are on my PS3. But i must learn to kept my mouth shut. So thanks a bunch for such a lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey117

customer_reviews.title: Most versatile on the market
customer_reviews.text: This was the best blu-ray player on the market and sony discontinued it. I'd like to ask why? Is there something comparable to it?

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It works great. It is easy to navigate and looks great. However, it takes awhile to setup and I really don't like that google tv blocks hulu so you have to buy hulu plus. Other than that this is a great product!

customer_reviews.title: Took a little time to set up. but has worked excellent since then.
customer_reviews.text: Item must be set up from cable and satelitte box to the TV using HDMI cables for this unit to work. It comes with 1 HDMI so you will need another for complete set up. Item works well, but the set up instructions could use some work.

customer_reviews.title: Sony appears to be a leader in this area, starting from $70
customer_reviews.text: Again...who does it best?....and...not worst but its all relative to pricing. This media player works as it should..PLUS...the price is coming down but even at $200, no need for second thoughts. There are only two units better below $200....to a smaller price, but dont have the same features....one is....yep, Sony...the other and very best below $200.....can i say?....ok, begins with a P. DY.

customer_reviews.title: sony nsz wi-fi
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blue ray player/ Google TV last december, I am not too happy with it. the streaming is very difficult and keeps stopping and alot of times the picture is not clear. using a labtop is way much better than this, and I wouldnt recomend this unit.

customer_reviews.title: Already in the box to be returned
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in horrible condition, wrapped in cellophane and scuffed and scratched everywhere. It didn't come with the controller, which is absolutely require to operate it, as it only has a power and eject butron. And there was some George Clooney movie inside it I've never heard of, which I couldn't have watched if I wanted without the controller because there was a giant prompt on the screen asking me to set the date and time.

customer_reviews.title: Hated It
customer_reviews.text: Hated it and I sent it back. It took a while to connect and it wasn't very fast or very easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever from sony
customer_reviews.text: No updates from sony. None of the apps works. Worst purchase ever from sony.

product_meta.title: Sony NSZ-GT1 1080p Blu-ray Disc Player Featuring Google TV with Built-In Wi-Fi
product_meta.description:
Access more entertainment than ever. Presenting Sony Internet TV Blu-ray Disc player, powered by Google TV. Search the entire web, TV listings and apps1 to find exactly what you're looking for. Watch TV, browse the internet2, or do both at the same time on the same screen. Plus, finding your favorite content is a breeze thanks to the included, intuitive handheld keypad with mouse. Now you can watch the game while tracking your fantasy team, tweet about the TV show you're watching, or update your Facebook status while viewing TV.

AMAZON.COM
 

INTERNET-READY TELEVISION
Internet-ready TVs use your broadband connection to deliver dynamic content, whether it's streaming video from Netflix, new music from Pandora, or a quick glance at today's weather forecast.

Although there is overlap, each manufacturer offers a unique bundle of free or paid services, including streaming video and music, social networking apps, online photo galleries, news and financial updates, weather info, sports scores, and a variety of other smartphone-like applications.

Manufacturers continue to add new content to their offerings, keeping customers current through firmware updates, and making a bit of research a prudent step in your buying decision.

Learn more about Internet TVs, how they work, what services are offered by different manufacturers, and exactly what you'll need to get started at our Internet TV 101 customer center.





Sony's NSZ-GT1 Internet TV Blu-ray Disc Player redefines the way a Blu-ray Disc Player looks with its sleek, stylish design. It also makes advances with Google TV on-board: search the entire web, TV listings, and apps to find exactly what you're looking for. Watch TV, browse the Internet, or do both at the same time on the same screen. Plus, finding your favorite content is a breeze thanks to the included, intuitive handheld keypad with mouse. Now you can watch the game while tracking your fantasy team, tweet about the TV show you're watching, or update your Facebook status while viewing TV. Not to mention play back all those Blu-ray Discs and DVDs...

Enjoy easy access to more entertainment than ever before. Click here for a larger image TELEVISION, MEET INTERNET
GOOGLE TV BUILT-IN
Google TV delivers a new experience by bringing the TV and internet together. Using your existing cable or satellite service and at no additional cost, Google TV gives you access to more entertainment options and simplifies the process of finding what you're looking for. Plus, you can enjoy both TV and web content at the same time, on the same screen.

Automatic upgrades from the powerful Google TV platform ensure that your Sony Internet device is up-to-date, and you can access thousands of downloadable applications from the library of Android Apps, for new content and capabilities.

Personalize your TV experience with downloadable applications such as:

 * Twitter: Keep in touch with people and get real-time updates.
 * Napster: MP3 downloads and unlimited on-demand music streaming.
 * Pandora: Free, personalized internet radio playing only the music you love.
 * Netflix: Instantly watch Hollywood movies and thousands of TV episodes.
 * Android Market: Made-for-TV apps redefine your television experience. Discover more with apps from the ever expanding Android Market.
   
 * NBA: Check stats while you watch the game. See standings, video highlights and more

Use the intuitive handheld keypad for easy navigation of Internet features. Google TV delivers a new experience by bringing the TV and internet together. Play back Blu-Ray Discs, DVDs (with upscaling to 1080p), CDs and more. INTUITIVE HANDHELD KEYPAD
Use the intuitive handheld keypad for easy navigation of Internet features. An optical finger sensor offers control the mouse pointer, scrolling, zooming in on images, and more; and a a full QWERTY keyboard is provided for entering text.

SUPERIOR PROCESSING WITH INTEL
Intel is at the heart of Sony's TV evolution, delivering processing power and intelligence for world-class HD video, audio and advanced graphics.

BUILT-IN WI-FI
Enjoy the convenience of built-in wireless connectivity to make accessing your online entertainment--including movies, photos, music, videos and more--even easier. For those who require or prefer a hardware LAN connection, an Ethernet port is provided as well.

SEARCH ACROSS TV & INTERNET
Whatever you're searching for, Sony Internet TV will help you find it on TV or the Internet. Whether you're looking for a channel, show, or website, spend less time searching and more time watching. 

SURF THE WEB WHILE WATCHING TV
Navigate between websites and television channels or enjoy both at the same time, on the same screen, with Picture-in-Picture. Easy as checking your favorite team’s stats while watching the game, or tweet with Twitter while you are watching.

3D BLU-RAY DISC PLAYBACK
With the convenience of a built-in 3D Blu-ray Disc player, watch your favorite movies in Full HD 1080p in 2D or 3D.1 The network connection means you can access online BD-Live content as well, and 24p True Cinema allows for viewing video at the intended 24 fps (frames per second) picture quality.

Built-in 1080p upscaling converts lower-resolution sources, so you can enjoy your DVDs in full HD quality (along with music from your CDs).

NETWORK/USB MEDIA PLAYBACK
Most of us have an increasingly large number of digital media files these days, and the NSZ-GT1 offers support for several formats. Play back MP3 audio files, H.264 and MP4 video, and JPEG/GIF/PNG image files directly from USB devices. You can also just grab them from your network storage device or computer, thanks to DLNA (photo only) and UPnP (video/music/photo) network standards.

LINK TO SELECT MOBILE PHONES
Add your mobile phone to the Google TV experience. Using your existing Android phone or iPhone as an additional remote control, search content with voice navigation, or share web content between the phone and TV.

DVR COMPATIBILITY
Easily connect select HD DVR devices from Dish Network to include your previously recorded content in the search results.

NSZ-GT1 SELECT SPECIFICATIONS
Supported Media Formats Disc: BD-ROM, CD, CD-R/RW, CD-DA, DVD, DVD+R/RW, DVD-R/RW, Hybrid BD/DVD, BD/CD, Bonus View, BD Live Video: AC/MPEG4-AAC, H.264/MPEG-4 AVC Music: MP3 Photo: JPEG, GIF, PNG Internet Capability: Google TV DLNA/UPnP Playback: Photo (DLNA), Video/Music/Photo (UPnP) Inputs and Outputs Digital Audio Output (Optical): 1 (Rear) Ethernet Connection: 10BASE-T/100BASE-TX/1000BASE-T (Rear) Wireless LAN: 802.11.a/b/g/n HDMI Input 1 (Rear) HDMI Output 1 (Rear) IR Blaster: 1 (Rear) USB 2.0: 4 (3 Rear/1 Front) Weight and Dimensions Dimensions (WxHxD): 13 x 2.3 x 9.8 Inches Weight: 5.3 lbs. 
1. Broadband Internet connection speed of at least 2.5 Mbps recommended (10 Mbps for HD content). Video quality and picture size vary and are dependent upon broadband speed and delivery by content provider. Select content provided subject to change. Premium content may require additional fees, a subscription and/or PC registration. Wireless connectivity requires a home network with an 802.11 access point (802.11n recommended).
2. Application must be downloaded from the application store. Check phone’s application store from your device for compatibility. Requires that the Google TV device and the remote device be connected to the same home network with the remote device connected through an 802.11 access point (802.11n recommended).
3. Check Dish Network website or owner’s manual for compatibility.
4. 3D requires 3D content, 1080p 3D HDTV, 3D glasses, 3D emitter, and HDMI™ cable (at least 10.2 Gbps).
WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Sony NSZ-GT1 Internet TV Blu-ray Disc Player, Keypad With Batteries, HDMI Cable, IR Blaster Cable, AC Power Cord, AC Adapter, Documentation







FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Access more entertainment than ever. Presenting Sony Internet TV Blu-ray Disc player, powered by Google TV. Search the entire web, TV listings and apps1 to find exactly what you're looking for. Watch TV, browse the internet2, or do both at the same time on the same screen. Plus, finding your favorite content is a breeze thanks to the included, intuitive handheld keypad with mouse. Now you can watch the game while tracking your fantasy team, tweet about the TV show you're watching, or update your Facebook status while viewing TV.

See more
feature_bullets: Google TV brings TV and Internet together, and seamlessly searches your device, the entire web & apps
Blu-ray Disc playback capability, along with DVDs, CDs, and digital files via USB or network devices
Intel Atom Processor (1.66GHz) for world-class HD video, audio, and advanced graphics
Surf the web while watching TV using Dual View, stay up to date with an upgradeable OS, Power : AC 120 V
It has full HD, 24fps playback. Upconversion of lower-resolution sources, it is not 3d compatible
